official_title: To designate a United States courthouse to be constructed in Fresno, California, as the "Robert E. Coyle United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse to be constructed on land bounded by O Street, P Street, Tulare Street, and Capitol Street in Fresno, California, as the Robert. E. Coyle United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To designate a United States courthouse to be constructed in Fresno, California, as the "Robert E. Coyle United States Courthouse".
